alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:37PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hunterdon, northern Mercer, southwestern Somerset, southwestern Middlesex and east central Bucks Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pennington, or 11 miles northwest of Trenton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Princeton, Pennington, New Hope, Hopewell, Rocky Hill, Millstone, Washington Crossing, Skillman, Princeton Meadows, Sergeantsville, Kingston, Plainsboro Center, Belle Mead, Lawrenceville, Cloverhill, Kendall Park, Lambertville, Princeton Junction and Princeton North. This includes Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 67 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
